Verses: 1 pelshaadhsaar Ennum Raajaa Than Prabukkalil Aayiramperukku Oru Periya Virundhu Seydhu, Andha Aayiramperukku Munbaaga Dhraatcharasam Kudiththaan.

2 pelshaadhsaar Dhraatcharasaththai Rusiththukkondirukkaiyil, Avan Than Thagappanaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Erusalem Dhevaalayaththilirundhu Konduvandha Pon Velli Paaththirangalil, Raajaavaagiya Thaanum Than Prabukkalum Than Manaivigalum Than Vaippaattigalum Kudikkiradharkaaga Avaigalaik Konduvarumpadi Kattalaiyittaan.

3 appozhudhu Erusalemilulla Dhevanudaiya Veedaagiya Aalayaththilirundhu Edukkappatta Porpaaththirangalaik Konduvandhaargal; Avaigalil Raajaavum Avanudaiya Prabukkalum Avanudaiya Manaivigalum Avanudaiya Vaippaattigalum Kudiththaargal.
4 avargal Dhraatcharasam Kudiththu, Ponnum Velliyum Vengalamum Irumbum Maramum Kallumaagiya Dhevargalaip Pugazhndhaargal.
5 anneraththile Manusha Kaiviralgal Thondri Vilakkukku Edhiraaga Raaja Aramanaiyin Saandhu Poosappatta Suvarile Ezhudhitru; Ezhudhina Andhak Kaiyuruppai Raajaa Kandaan.
6 appozhudhu Raajaavin Mugam Verupattadhu; Avanudaiya Ninaivugal Avanaik Kalangappanninadhu; Avanudaiya Iduppin Kattugal Thalarndhadhu, Avanudaiya Muzhangaalgal Ondrodondru Modhikkondadhu.

7 raajaa Uraththa Saththamittu; Josiyaraiyum Kaldheyaraiyum Kurisollugiravargalaiyum Ulle Azhaiththuvarumpadi Sonnaan. Raajaa Baabilon Gnaanigalai Nokki: Indha Ezhuththai Vaasiththu, Idhin Arththaththai Enakku Velippaduththugiravan Evano Avan Raththaambaramum Kazhuththile Porcharappaniyum Tharikkappattu, Raajyaththile Moondraam Adhipadhiyaai Iruppaan Endru Sonnaan.
8 appozhudhu Raajaavin Gnaanigalellaarum Vandhu Serndhaargal; Aanaalum Avargal Andha Ezhuththai Vaasikkavum, Adhin Arththaththai Raajaavukkuth Therivikkavum Koodaadhirundhadhu.
9 appozhudhu Raajaavaagiya Pelshaadhsaar Migavum Kalanginaan; Avanudaiya Mugam Verupattadhu; Avanudaiya Prabukkal Thigaiththaargal.

10 raajaavum Avanudaiya Prabukkalum Sonnavaigalai Raajaaththi Kelvippattu Virundhusaalaikkul Pravesiththaal. Appozhudhu Raajaaththi: Raajaave Neer Endrum Vaazhga; Umadhu Ninaivugal Ummaik Kalangappannavum, Umadhu Mugam Verupadavum Vendiyadhillai.

11 ummudaiya Raajyaththile Oru Purushan Irukkiraan, Avanukkul Parisuththa Dhevargaludaiya Aavi Irukkiradhu; Ummudaiya Pidhaavin Naatkalil Velichchamum Vivegamum Dhevargalin Gnaanaththukku Oththa Gnaanamum Avanidaththil Kaanappattadhu; Aagaiyaal Ummudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Ennum Raajaavaanavar Avanai Saasthirigalukkum Josiyarukkum Kaldheyarukkum Kurisollugiravargalukkum Adhipadhiyaaga Vaiththaar.

12 raajaavinaal Peldheshaadhsaarennum Peridappatta Andha Dhaaniyelukkul Soppanangalai Viyaarththipannugiradhum, Pudhaiporulgalai Velippaduththugiradhum, Karugalaanavaigalaith Thelivikkiradhumaana Arivum Buththiyum Viseshiththa Aaviyum Undendru Kaanappattadhu; Ippodhum Dhaaniyel Azhaikkappadattum, Avan Arththaththai Velippaduththuvaan Endraal.

13 appozhudhu Dhaaniyel Raajaavinmun Ulle Azhaiththuvandhuvidappattaan; Raajaa Dhaaniyelaip Paarththu: Nee En Pidhaavaagiya Raajaa Yoodhaavilirundhu Siraipidiththuvandha Yoodharil Oruvanaagiya Dhaaniyel Allavaa?
14 unakkulle Dhevargalin Aavi Undendrum, Velichchamum Buththiyum Viseshiththa Gnaanamum Unnidaththil Kaanappattadhendrum Unnaikkuriththuk Kelvippatten.

15 ippodhum Indha Ezhuththai Vaasikkiradharkum, Idhin Arththaththai Enakkuth Therivikkiradharkum Saasthirigalum Josiyarum Enakku Munbaaga Azhaiththukkonduvarappattaargal; Aanaalum Indha Vasanaththin Arththaththai Velippaduththa Avargalaal Koodaamarpoyitru.

16 porulai Velippaduththavum Karugalaanavaigalaith Thelivikkavum Unnaikkuriththuk Kelvippatten; Ippodhu Nee Indha Ezhuththai Vaasikkavum, Idhin Arththaththai Enakkuth Therivikkavum Unnaale Koodumaanaal, Nee Raththaambaramum Kazhuththile Porcharappaniyum Tharikkappattu, Raajyaththile Moondraam Adhipadhiyaai Iruppaai Endraan.

17 appozhudhu Dhaaniyel Raajasamugaththil Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ummudaiya Vegumaanangal Ummidaththileye Irukkattum; Ummudaiya Parisugalai Veroruvanukkuk Kodum. Indha Ezhuththai Naan Raajaavukku Vaasiththu, Idhin Arththaththaith Therivippen.
18 raajaave Unnadhamaana Dhevan Ummudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarukku Raajyaththaiyum Magaththuvaththaiyum Ganaththaiyum Magimaiyaiyum Koduththaar.

19 avarukkuk Kodukkappatta Magaththuvaththile Sagala Janangalum Jaadhiyaarum Baashaikkaararum Avarukku Munbaaga Nadungi Bayandhirundhaargal; Avar Thamakku Siththamaanavanaik Kondrupoduvaar, Thamakku Siththamaanavanai Uyirode Vaippaar, Thamakku Siththamaanavanai Uyarththuvaar, Thamakku Siththamaanavanaith Thaazhththuvaar.
20 avarudaiya Irudhayam Mettimaiyaagi, Avarudaiya Aavi Garvaththinaale Kadinappattapodhu, Avar Thamadhu Singaasanaththilirundhu Thallappattaar; Avarudaiya Magimai Avaraivittu Agandrupoyitru.

21 avar Manusharinindru Thallappattaar; Avarudaiya Irudhayam Mirugangaludaiya Irudhayampolaayitru; Kaattukkazhudhaigalode Sanjariththaar; Unnadhamaana Dhevan Manusharin Raajyaththil Aalugai Seydhu, Thamakku Siththamaanavanai Adhinmel Adhikaariyaakkugiraar Endru Avar Unarndhukollumattum Maadugalaippol Pullai Meyndhaar; Avarudaiya Sareeram Aagaayaththup Paniyile Nanaindhadhu.
22 avarudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Pelshaadhsaar Ennum Neerovendraal, Idhaiyellaam Arindhirundhum, Umadhu Irudhayaththaith Thaazhththaamal,

23 paralogaththin Aandavarukku Virodhamaaga Ummai Uyarththineer; Avarudaiya Aalayaththin Paaththirangalai Umakku Munbaagak Konduvandhaargal; Neerum, Ummudaiya Prabukkalum, Ummudaiya Manaivigalum Ummudaiya Vaippaattigalum Avaigalil Dhraatcharasam Kudiththeergal; Idhuvumandri, Thammudaiya Kaiyil Umadhu Suvaasaththai Vaiththirukkiravarum, Umadhu Vazhigalukku Ellaam Adhigaariyumaagiya Dhevanai Neer Magimaippaduththaamal Kaanaamalum Kelaamalum Unaraamalum Irukkira Velliyum Ponnum Vengalamum Irumbum Maramum Kallumaagiya Dhevargalaip Pugazhndheer.
24 appozhudhu Andhak Kaiyuruppu Avaraal Anuppappattu, Indha Ezhuththu Ezhudhappattadhu
25 ezhudhappatta Ezhuththu Ennavendraal: Mene, Mene, Thekkel, Uppaarsin Enbadhe.
26 indha Vasanaththin Arththamaavadhu: Mene Enbadharku, Dhevan Un Raajyaththai Mattittu Adharku Mudivundaakkinaar Endrum,
27 thekkel Enbadharku Nee Tharaasile Nirukkappattu, Kuraiyak Kaanappattaai Endrum,
28 peres Enbadharku, Un Raajyam Pirikkappattu, Medhiyarukkum Persiyarukkum Kodukkappattadhu Endrum Arththamaam Endraan.

29 appozhudhu Pelshaadhsaar Dhaaniyelukku Raththaambaraththaiyum, Avanudaiya Kazhuththil Porcharappaniyaiyum Tharippikkavum, Raajyaththile Avan Moondraam Adhigaariyaayiruppavan Endru Avanaikkuriththup Paraimuraiyidavum Kattalaiyittaan.
30 andru Raaththiriyile Kaldheyarin Raajaavaagiya Pelshaadhsaar Kolaiseyyappattaan.
31 medhiyanaagiya Thariyu Than Arubaththirandaam Vayadhil Raajyaththaikkattikkondaan.
